title: Desert Dirt Bags | Chris Distefano Presents: Chrissy Chaos | EP 7
description:
WELCOME to Chrissy Chaos! 


This episode Chrissy Chaos and Sergio Chicon AKA BLIZZY are out in the GREAT OUTDOORS CUZ! They are broadcasting from the desert of Arizona like some true dirt bags. They talk about how the weekend of shows is going at the House of Comedy in Phoenix, Arizona. Vinny had to go to the emergency room and Chris falls in love with the healthcare system of Arizona. Our road guy Billy tells us a quality POOP story. They chat about the day they spent at Goldfield Ghost Town, is Sergio Mr.Potato head?!, Vinny thinks the apartment is haunted, Whats really good with cacti?, why are reptile lovers called herps, Then we jump back to Chrissy Chaos on the couch in Brooklyn and we talk Chrissy pilots LA plans for the next few months.


Remember to rate us on iTunes and Join our Patreon for a WEEKLY bonus ep! 


patreon.com/chrisdcomedy


Bluechew.com - promo code Chaos


 


CHRISDCOMEDY.COM for all upcoming live comedy show dates 


FOLLOW Chris Distefano On Social Media 


Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/chrisdcomedy/​


Twitter - https://twitter.com/chrisdcomedy​



Follow Chris' podcast with Sal Vulcano called HEY BABE! 


https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD8I...​


​


Filmed and Edited by 


THEHOMELESSPIMP https://www.instagram.com/thehomeless...​
